snippet: The woman, briefly abducted in 2012, was kidnapped again by suspected jihadists who scaled the walls of her home.
abstract: Malian officials say Swiss woman Beatrice Stockly, who was abducted in 2012 by Islamic extremists who accused her of promoting Christianity, has been kidnapped again.
lead_paragraph: The woman, briefly abducted in 2012, was kidnapped again by suspected jihadists who scaled the walls of her home.

headline.main: Mali: Swiss Woman Is Kidnapped for a Second Time
headline.print_headline: Mali: Swiss Woman Is Kidnapped for a Second Time
